channel.title: VoIP as a Service on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in VoIP as a Service on 0x000216

item.title: Should You Buy VoIP as a Service?
item.description: Cloud-based services, including Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP), have been around for a while. What’s becoming more popular now is the trend of large businesses connecting their different locations using SIP Trunks and all sizes of businesses choosing to outsource their PBX functionality. This can be considered VoIP as a Service. Many home and small business users adopted cloud-based VoIP early on to cut costs. They did this by replacing their traditional phone lines and using their broadband internet connection for both high-speed internet and phone service.
